name: Opportunity
description: Represents a sale or pending deal.
summary:
The **Opportunity** object in Salesforce represents potential revenue-generating events or sales deals within an organization. It is a critical element for managing sales pipelines and forecasting revenue. Here is a summary of its key attributes:

1. **Id**: Unique identifier for the opportunity.
2. **IsDeleted**: Indicates if the opportunity is deleted.
3. **AccountId**: Reference to the associated account.
4. **IsPrivate**: Marks the opportunity as private.
5. **Name**: Name of the opportunity.
6. **Description**: Detailed description of the opportunity.
7. **StageName**: Current stage in the sales process (picklist).
8. **Amount**: Potential revenue (currency).
9. **Probability**: Likelihood of closing the deal (percent).
10. **ExpectedRevenue**: Calculated expected revenue (currency).
11. **TotalOpportunityQuantity**: Total quantity of products or services.
12. **CloseDate**: Expected or actual close date of the opportunity.
13. **Type**: Type of opportunity (picklist).
14. **NextStep**: Next action or step for the opportunity.
15. **LeadSource**: Origin of the lead (picklist).
16. **IsClosed**: Indicates if the opportunity is closed.
17. **IsWon**: Indicates if the opportunity is won.
18. **ForecastCategory**: Category used for forecasting (picklist).
19. **ForecastCategoryName**: Name of the forecast category (picklist).
20. **CampaignId**: Reference to the associated marketing campaign.
21. **HasOpportunityLineItem**: Indicates if the opportunity has line items.
22. **Pricebook2Id**: Reference to the associated pricebook.
23. **OwnerId**: Reference to the owner of the opportunity.
24. **CreatedDate**: Date and time when the opportunity was created.
25. **CreatedById**: Reference to the user who created the opportunity.
26. **LastModifiedDate**: Date and time of the last modification.
27. **LastModifiedById**: Reference to the user who last modified the opportunity.
28. **SystemModstamp**: System-generated timestamp for the last update.
29. **LastActivityDate**: Date of the last activity on the opportunity.
30. **PushCount**: Number of times the close date has been postponed.
31. **LastStageChangeDate**: Date of the last stage change.
32. **FiscalQuarter**: Fiscal quarter of the opportunity.
33. **FiscalYear**: Fiscal year of the opportunity.
34. **Fiscal**: Fiscal information.
35. **ContactId**: Reference to the associated contact.
36. **LastViewedDate**: Date when the opportunity was last viewed.
37. **LastReferencedDate**: Date when the opportunity was last referenced.
38. **HasOpenActivity**: Indicates if there are any open activities.
39. **HasOverdueTask**: Indicates if there are any overdue tasks.
40. **LastAmountChangedHistoryId**: Reference to the history of the last amount change.
41. **LastCloseDateChangedHistoryId**: Reference to the history of the last close date change.
42. **DeliveryInstallationStatus__c**: Delivery/installation status (picklist).
43. **TrackingNumber__c**: Tracking number for delivery.
44. **OrderNumber__c**: Order number for the opportunity.
45. **CurrentGenerators__c**: Current generators (custom field).
46. **MainCompetitors__c**: Main competitors (custom field).

These attributes collectively provide a comprehensive view of sales opportunities, facilitating effective sales management and forecasting.
label: Opportunity
